simplefps.config.title: SimpleFPS Configuration
simplefps.config.enabled.tooltip: Toggle the FPS counter on or off.
simplefps.config.textOpacity.tooltip: Adjust the visibility/opacity of the FPS text (0-100%).
simplefps.config.textColor.tooltip: Set the text color using a hex code (e.g., #FFFFFF for white).
simplefps.config.textSize.tooltip: Adjust the size of the FPS text (0.5x to 4.0x scale).
simplefps.config.positionX.tooltip: Horizontal position of the FPS counter on screen.
simplefps.config.positionY.tooltip: Vertical position of the FPS counter on screen.
simplefps.config.backgroundColor.tooltip: Set background color using hex code (e.g., #000000 for black).
simplefps.config.backgroundOpacity.toolt: Adjust the opacity of the background (0-100%).
simplefps.config.showBackground.tooltip: Display a background behind the FPS text.
simplefps.config.adaptiveColor.tooltip: Color text based on FPS: Red (low), Yellow (medium), Green (high). Overrides custom text color.
simplefps.config.lowFpsThreshold.tooltip: FPS at or below this value will be shown in Red.
simplefps.config.highFpsThreshold.toolti: FPS at or above this value will be shown in Green. Between thresholds shows Yellow.
simplefps.config.graphEnabled.tooltip: Show a visual graph of FPS history with Min/Max/Avg stats.
simplefps.config.graphScale.tooltip: Adjust the size of the FPS graph (50% to 200%).
simplefps.config.graphX.tooltip: Horizontal position of the FPS graph on screen.
simplefps.config.graphY.tooltip: Vertical position of the FPS graph on screen.
